Title: Black Friday
Plot: Crews and Reese must track down the body of a murder victim and a killer when a murder takes place in one of the largest malls in America on one of the biggest shopping days of the year.
GuestStars: Kyle Gallner, William Atherton, Shashawnee Hall, Brianne Davis, Steven Crowley, Mary Matilyn Mouser, Bonnie Hellman, Kai Schmoll, Bill Lee Brown, Monica Lee, Emily Rae Argenti, Marcus Giamatti, James Mitchel Clyd
